casebody.data:
No. 09-887. E. H. and K. H., on Their Own Behalf and as Parents and Next Friends of C. H., a Minor, Petitioners v. Board of Education of the Shenendehowa Central School District, et al. 559 U.S. 1037, 130 S. Ct. 2064,

176 L. Ed. 2d 415,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 2912. March 29, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Same case below, 361 Fed. Appx. 156.
